item.title: Org-mode
item.description: Config org-mode Configuring TODOS Workflow states In the file itself: Org mode files can be configured by adding workflow states to the beginning of the file,like so: 1 #+TODO: TODO IN-PROGRESS WAITING DONE In the Emacs-configure file Add the following after the (require ‘org) line: 1 2 (setq org-todo-keywords '((sequence "TODO" "IN-PROGRESS" "WAITING" "DONE"))) To activate the workflow states, restart Emacs. Configuring the agenda in the Emacs configuration file If

item.title: Org-mode
item.description: :vim 实用技巧: [TOC] 启用高亮查找:set hlsearch 彻底禁用高亮查找:set nohlsearch 暂时关闭高亮查找:nohlsearch,高亮功能会一直关闭，直到执行新的或重复

item.title: Vim配置python开发环境
item.description: 功能:代码提示,代码补全,语法检查,snippet补全 系统和软件版本: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 $ vim --version VIM - Vi IMproved 8.2 (2019 Dec 12, compiled Mar 26 2021 00:21:09) Included patches: 1-2653 Compiled by Arch Linux $ uname -a Linux kamisama-20e0a013cd
